textBox.richText: Alli had rugby this weekend, so, to continue the tradition, Gunter came out for “boys weekend”. Max had class, so I had to do some show ‘n tell, and show Gunter the Skis and the plaque for Tophers. This is a legendary underground area at Jane. The story goes that Topher hit a tree well and died, and to mark it, they put his skis on the tree where he bit it. There’s also a plaque you can see from Corona way if you look hard. No vids from the day, but here are a couple pics...
